resource.chars:
Blood, an ‘agency’:
makes ‘volition’ something 
distinct from ‘Nervous agency’
and confounds together 
gravitation with molecular 
attraction 
At page 7. Dr. Radcliffe 
makes a statement as to 
the mode of contraction of 
the Trio - which unless 
it be the [text?] of inadvertence 
betrays a want of acquaintance 
with some of the most 
elementary physiological 
facts -
